Instructions: In this questionnaire, you report on your preferences to perform certain activities at different times of the day. Please fill in the questionnaire with regard to the past 4 weeks.
Approximately at what time would you wake up if you were entirely free to plan your day?
Approximately at what time would you go to bed if you were entirely free to plan your evening?
If you usually have to get up at a specific time in the morning, how much do you depend on an alarm clock?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all | 2, Slightly | 3, Somewhat | 4, Very much

Field Label: How easy do you find it to get up in the morning (when you are not woken up unexpectedly)?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Very difficult | 2, Somewhat difficult | 3, Fairly easy | 4, Very easy

Field Label: How alert do you feel during the first half-hour after you wake up in the morning?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all alert | 2, Slightly alert | 3, Fairly alert | 4, Very alert

Field Label: How hungry do you feel during the first half-hour after you wake?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all hungry | 2, Slightly hungry | 3, Fairly hungry | 4, Very hungry

Field Label: During the first half-hour after you wake up in the morning, how do you feel?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Very tired | 2, Fairly tired | 3, Fairly refreshed | 4, Very refreshed

Field Label: If you have no commitments the next day, what time would you go to bed compared to your usual bedtime?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Seldom or never later | 2, Less than 1 hour later | 3, 1-2 hours later | 4, More than 2 hours later

Field Label: You have decided to do some physical exercise. A friend suggests that you do this for one hour twice a week and the best time for him is between 7:00 - 8:00 am. Bearing in mind nothing but your own internal "clock", how do you think you would perform?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Would be in good form | 2, Would be in reasonable form | 3, Would find it difficult | 4, Would find it very difficult

Field Label: At what time in the evening do you feel tired, and as a result, in need of sleep?

You want to be at your peak performance for a test that you know is going to be mentally exhausting and will last for two hours. You are entirely free to plan your day. Considering only your own internal "clock", which one of the four testing times would you choose?
If you got into bed at 23:00, how tired would you be?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Not at all tired | 2, A little tired | 3, Fairly tired | 4, Very tired

Field Label: For some reason you have gone to bed several hours later than usual, but there is no need to get up at any particular time the next morning. Which one of the following are you most likely to do?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Will wake up at usual time, but will not fall back asleep | 2, Will wake up at the usual time and will doze thereafter | 3, Will wake up at the usual time, but will fall asleep again | 4, Will not wake up until later than usual

Field Label: One night you have to remain awake between 4:00 - 6:00 in order to carry out a night watch. You have no commitments the next day. Which one of the alternatives will suit you best?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Would not go to bed until the watch was over | 2, Would take a nap before and sleep after | 3, Would take a good sleep before and nap after | 4, Would only sleep before the watch

Field Label: You have to do two hours of hard physical work. You are entirely free to plan your day. Considering only your own internal "clock" which one of the following times would you choose?

You have decided to engage in hard physical exercise. A friend suggests that you do this for one hour twice a week. The best time for him is between 22:00 - 23:00. Bearing in mind nothing else but your own internal "clock", how well do you think you would perform?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Would be in good form | 2, Would be in reasonable form | 3, Would find it difficult | 4, Would find it very difficult

Field Label: Suppose that you can choose your own work hours. Assume that you work a five-hour day (including breaks), your job is interesting, and you are paid based on your performance. At approximately what time would you choose to begin?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, 5 hours starting between 4:00 and 8:00 | 2, 5 hours starting between 8:00 and 9:00 | 3, 5 hours starting between 9:00 and 14:00 | 4, 5 hours starting between 14:00 and 17:00 | 5, 5 hours starting between 17:00 and 4:00

Field Label: At approximately what time of the day do you usually feel your best?
One hears about "morning types" and "evening types". Which one of these types do you consider yourself to be?
Choices, Calculations, OR Slider Labels: 1, Definitely a morning type | 2, Rather more a morning type than an evening type | 3, Rather more an evening type than a morning type | 4, Definitely an evening type
